title: Bug 120315 - Display property 'none' not working in new PDF emitter
OB: When the display property of an item is set to 'none', it does not take effect in the new PDF emitter.
SR:
Steps to Reproduce:

1. Add a label to the document.
2. Open the 'properties' view.
3. Set the 'sectionDisplay' property to 'none'.
4. Generate a PDF using the new emitter.
